name: HolmberG
description:
Here is the idea i create for the GOEDWAREGAMEJAM #4 with the space theme.

Is a space shotter with multiples game modes

- First person view, the original of this game

-Radar Mode, a harder mode where you only see the radars to destroy and survive the waves.

-Classic Mode, a aview of the classic asteroid game with this controls.

Hope you like it and enjoy it, tell me what was your favorite game mode for this game x3.
